mapper.select: SELECT SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_ID, SYS_FUNCTION.PARENT_ID, SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_NAME, SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_URL, SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_TYPE, SYS_FUNCTION.CREATE_TIME, SYS_FUNCTION.SORT FROM SYS_FUNCTION WHERE SYS_FUNCTION.PARENT_ID=#{parent_id} ORDER BY SYS_FUNCTION.SORT DESC

SELECT SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_ID, SYS_FUNCTION.PARENT_ID, SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_NAME, SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_URL,SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_TYPE, SYS_FUNCTION.CREATE_TIME, SYS_FUNCTION.SORT FROM SYS_FUNCTION ORDER BY SYS_FUNCTION.SORT DESC
